name: Single Arrow
description:
Created for GMTK Game Jam 2019 - "only one"

In Single Arrow, you have but one arrow to survive waves of enemies with. Fire and collect your arrow to keep yourself alive.

Game was created in about 9-10 hours, joined the jam pretty late and would of liked to of done more but happy with what I've accomplished within the time frame.

Controls:

A/D - Move Left and Right
Space - Jump
Mouse - Aim Bow
Left Mouse - Fire Bow
Walk over the arrow to pick it up
